title: The High Harper
tags: how to unlock the high harper
content:
cally so you'll get the next options to respond:

[PERSUASION] Let me help. I'll go and check on your Head Banker. Tell me more about this large fellow. It sounds like a robbery to me. I want to open an account. Leave.

If you choose to attempt the Persuasion check, you will need to pass a DC of 18. If you succeed, the Head Clerk will say that it is unusual but will agree nevertheless. He will hand you a temporary vault pass that will give access to the lower part of The Counting House. Interact
